title: [Nereid's Cradle, Beach]
description: Set to a backdrop of blue-green grass with feathery beige tops, the white-sand beach is serene.  Starlight reflects off the flecks of mica within the fine white sands, causing it to sparkle and shimmer as gentle tidal breezes cool the air and carry the tang of salt to the area.  Flanked by thin trails and sandy paths that slip through the encircling dunes, a pair of stone slab steps departs from the beach and connects with a flat stone landing with a wythe-encircled entrance in the distant cliff face.
